snippet.title: Saghala: Heroes of the Last World - VideoTrailer #indiegame #saghala
snippet.description:

About Saghala:

Saghala: Heroes of the Last World is a story about the last survivors on a destroyed planet. It's about rebuilding, discovering secrets and searching for the legendary last fusion reactor "The Core". 

Adventure in a post-apocalyptic world - travel the world of Saghala in search of "The Core", visit traders and villagers, complete side missions, explore shelters, buildings and dungeons, fight enemies in a card battle game, upgrade your settlement, produce resources (gold, scrap, food, fuel and wood) and craft new combat cards! Just remember, your most important challenge is to survive and find the Legendary Core!

Saghala is an mix of adventure and strategy game full of challenges and stories. Choose one of the 2 (or 4) factions that differ significantly from each other!

Defeating enemies and completing missions will require a lot of creativity and resourcefulness, craft new powerfull cards and building an stronger deck.

These are not only simple missions (e.g. find Grandpa Jones' lost potty in a nearby shelter), but also great adventures in 4 different biomes. The enemy can be anywhere, the more you discover, the more complex and difficult the world becomes ...

Talking with villagers in settlements and shelters you meet to find as many clues as possible to find "The Core"! Create your own story of your hero and discover the secrets of Saghala!
